snippet: Baltimore has typically not performed well in playoff games at Pittsburgh, but an injury to the Steelers’ Le’Veon Bell could help the Ravens.
abstract: Preview of AFC wild-card matchup between Baltimore Ravens and Pittsburgh Steelers.
lead_paragraph: Baltimore has typically not performed well in playoff games at Pittsburgh, but an injury to the Steelers’ Le’Veon Bell could help the Ravens.

headline.main: A.F.C. Wild-Card Matchup: Baltimore Ravens vs. Pittsburgh Steelers
